data.title: andBeyond Vira Vira
data.meta_description: Marvel at the magnificent Villarrica Volcano when you stay at andBeyond Vira Vira, a luxury lodge in Chile's Lake District. The homeland of the courageous Mapuche people.
data.meta_site_name: Luxury African Safaris,South America & South Asia Tours|andBeyond
data.text:
Located in the Lake District (the gateway to Patagonia), Chile

Access to our lodge:

Easily accessible from Chile and Argentina

SANTIAGO TO TEMUCO

1hr 20min flight (5 to 6 flights daily), followed by a 77km / 1hr 40mins road transfer to the lodge*

PUNTA ARENAS TO TEMUCO

2hr 30min flight for guests coming from Torres del Paine National Park in Patagonia, Antarctica or Australis cruises from Argentina, followed by

a 77km / 1hr 40mins road transfer to the lodge*

PUCON AIRPORT

Private charter flights only. Fly from Santiago, Puerto Montt, Bariloche, Punta Arenas or others (Customs and immigrations can be organised in advance), followed by a 11km / 15mins road transfer to the lodge*

PUNTA ARENAS TO PUERTO MONTT

2hr 10min flight, followed by a scenic 352km / 4hr 30mins road transfer through the Lake District to the lodge*

BUENOS AIRES TO BARILOCHE

2hr 20min flight, followed by a scenic full day private lake crossing tour (including border crossing) to the lodge*

SAN MART√çN DE LOS ANDES

180km / 3hrs + border crossing (self-drive / transfer) Pass the Argentinian flat Pampa, through Curarrehue and follow the Trancura River to the lodge

*Between November and March, helicopter transfers can be arranged at an additional cost (immigration will be arranged where necessary)
